Uses of Interface
is.merkor.core.database.data.PersistentObject

Packages that use PersistentObject
is.merkor.core.database.data Contains classes representing persistent objects mapping to the MerkOr relational database using Hibernate. 
test.core.database.data   
 

Uses of PersistentObject in is.merkor.core.database.data
 

Classes in is.merkor.core.database.data that implement PersistentObject
 class AbstractPersistentObject
          Abstract superclass implementing the PersistentObject interface.
 class ClusterCBC
          Maps to the relation CLUSTERS_WW3 in the MerkOr database, results of a CBC-similar clustering algorithm based on co-occurrence analysis of word-windows +/- 3.
 class ClusterItem
          Maps to the relation CLUSTER_ITEMS_WW3 in the MerkOr database.
 class HierarchClusterCBC
          HierarchClusterCBC represents a hierarchy of ClusterCBCs, having similar domains.
 class IceDictSense
          IceDictSenses maps to the table SENSES in the MerkOr database.
 class LexicalItem
          Maps to the relation LEXICAL_ITEM in the MerkOr database.
 class LexicalRelation
          The class LexicalRelation maps to the table CONFIDENCE_LEXREL in the MerkOr database.
 class LexicalRelationType
          LexicalRelationType maps to the table LEXICAL_RELATION_TYPE in the MerkOr database.
 class SimilarityCooccRelation
          A class mapping to the table SIMILARITY_COOCCURRENCE in the MerkOr database.
 class SimilarityVerbObjRelation
          A class mapping to the table SIMILARITY_VERB_OBJECT in the MerkOr database.
 class WordPair
          A class mapping to the relation WORDPAIR in the MerkOr database.
 

Uses of PersistentObject in test.core.database.data
 

Classes in test.core.database.data that implement PersistentObject
 class ClusterCBCStub
          A stub for ClusterCBC which does not have a constructor for parameter setting
 class HierarchClusterCBCStub
           
 class LexicalItemStub
          Class LexicalItem does not set the id attribute in the constructor (handled by the database) Added here for testing purposes
